p: This paper will address these questions using a risk assessment approach normally used by scientists working with pathogenic organisms or biohazardous materials and apply this approach to public health. Lessons learned from the SARS epidemic and guidelines for pandemics will be reviewed. Why are we so unprepared? In essence, the current COVID-19 pandemic appears to be an ongoing experiment on mitigating practices of a global emergency with broad implications for future health crises.
